text: <@U012FA83HKQ> if you check the documentation it will be clear for you about how to make the requests, check this as example, go ahead and install the contact sample app
this is the code for creating a contact - <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-php/blob/master/sample-apps/contacts-app/src/actions/contacts/new.php>
you can add more fields, by reading the documentation from the create contact method i shared above
I am sending it as seconds, so that is the problem.  Thanks for the hint!
depending on what you need you would either clear the property or not after processing the first form

There's a note about <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/timeline|v3 timelines API> being a public beta. How are you guys feeling about this API? Likely to change some things? Or does it feel ready?
